comments.author: Michael Busch
comments.body:
Removes Hits from core and all contribs.

All core and contrib tests pass. I'll have to commit some changes also to the bw-compat branch.

comments.author: Earwin Burrfoot
comments.body: Still some javadocs referencing Hits remaining, as well as Hits/Hit/HitIterator themselves. Is that okay?

comments.author: Michael Busch
comments.body: Thanks, Earwin, good catch. I'll remove them.

comments.author: Michael Busch
comments.body:
Oh man, I didn't even remove the classes (Hits, Hit, HitIterator) themselves :)

Forgot the 'svn rm' after applying the patch.  'svn patch', when are you finally coming?

description:
LUCENE-1290 removed all references to Hits from core.

Most work to be done here is to remove all references from the contrib modules and some new ones that crept into core after 1290.
